definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: Purveyor of smoked Canadian trout, Alaskan salmon and Lake Superior whitefish .
sentences.chinese: 接受者加拿大薰鱒魚，阿拉斯加鮭魚和湖優越的白魚。

sentences.english: The whitefish used to sell for between $70 and $80 per box.
sentences.chinese: 這種白魚以往每箱售價有70到80美元。

sentences.english: We used smoked whitefish, well boned, but any other smoked fish should work.
sentences.chinese: 我們採用薰白魚，粘結好，但任何其他薰魚應工作。

sentences.english: This wine goes very well with white fish.
Collard-Picard champagne is a great champagne to pair with white fish.
sentences.chinese: 羽衣甘藍，皮卡爾香檳是一個偉大的香檳搭配白魚。

sentences.english: Mongfish Foie Gras and Truffle White Fish Caviar with Potato and Celery Root Salad.
sentences.chinese: 魔鬼魚肝及松露菌白魚的魚子拌薯仔芹菜根沙律。

definition: clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs
tapertail anchovy (Coilia ectenes)/various species of cutlassfish/saury
fish maw/a food dish made from the swim bladder of fish
